title: Software Engineer, PayPal Identity
description: Backend engineer on PayPal’s Identity Platform, building and operating large-scale, mission-critical systems used across global merchant and consumer flows.

title: Outstanding Senior Award (UC Davis College of Engineering)
description: Awarded to one graduating senior per major in recognition of community impact through leadership.

title: Graduation, UC Davis
description: Graduated with Honors with a B.S. in Computer Science and Engineering, focused on building reliable systems and applied AI.

title: Undergraduate Research Conference Presenter
description: Presented research on using gamification to improve engagement and learning outcomes in introductory AI education.

title: President, SacHacks V
description: Led a cross-functional organizing team to revive and scale an international entrepreneurship hackathon with 600+ participants.

title: Going Live at SacHacks V
description: Moments before the opening ceremony went live, coordinating speakers, livestreams, and last-minute logistics for a global hackathon.

title: Featured at MLH Hackcon X
description: SacHacks was featured during Major League Hacking’s 2023 season kickoff, highlighting its growth and community impact.

title: President, CS Tutoring Club
description: Led a 50+ tutor organization providing free, peer-led CS tutoring in partnership with the UC Davis Computer Science department.

title: Founding Organizer, CS Research Symposium
description: Helped launch UC Davis’s first CS Research Symposium to make undergraduate research accessible across the department.

title: President, Google Developer Student Club at UC Davis (Also known as GDG on Campus)
description: Led and mentored a team of 30+ students to organize workshops on various Google technologies to help prepare UCD students for the industry.
